T02D2964:45b-0: @45b * // dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2964:45b-1: las thams cad ji ltar sgrub par 'dod pa'i sgrub
T02D2964:45b-2: ba po dam tshig dang ldan pas gnas khang yid
T02D2964:45b-3: dang mthun par mandal dang me tog dang bum pa
T02D2964:45b-4: dang mchod pa'i bye brag rnams bshams te /
T02D2964:45b-5: bdag nyid kyes bdun rnam dag la sogs pa bya ste /
T02D2964:45b-6: sngon du bya ba'i rim pa rnams ma lus par bya ste /
T02D2964:45b-7: de nas khrus dang nye reg la sogs pa rnams bya ste /
T02D2964:45b-8: h'um las byung ba'i khro bo 'dod pa'i rgyal po
T02D2964:45b-9: sku mdog dkar po zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa rdo
T02D2964:45b-10: rje dang ral gri dang gtun shing dang /
T02D2964:45b-11: zhags pa bsnams pa rab tu 'jigs pa chen po'i nga rgyal du byas te /
T02D2964:45b-12: ye shes kyi 'khor lo legs par sprul la 'dod
T02D2964:45b-13: pa'i don la legs par gsol ba byas la nyi
T02D2964:45b-14: ma dang zla ba gzas zin pa'i dus su /
T02D2964:45b-15: sin dh'u ra'i khu ba la sngags 'di stong phrag
T02D2964:45b-16: gsum bzlas te bum pa'i chu dang lus la byugs
T02D2964:45b-17: na ji ltar sgrub par 'dod pa'i don thams cad
T02D2964:45b-18: brtan zhing thogs pa med par 'gyur ro //
T02D2964:45b-20: aom aatta h'a sa n'i la badzra h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
T02D2964:45b-21: rgyud thams cad thogs pa med pa'i tshig legs par
